chapter.20.quest.1.description.1:
Welcome to &aArs Nouveau&f!


Ars Nouveau is a magic mod that allows you to create custom spells with the different Glyphs made within the mod!
chapter.20.quest.1.task.1.title: Ars Nouveau
chapter.20.quest.100.description.1:
To gain further knowledge of spells, we'll need a specific type of magical wood!


Unlike ATM6, Archwood Trees can be found in the overworld.
chapter.20.quest.100.task.1.title: Archwood Logs
chapter.20.quest.100.task.2.title: Archwood Planks
chapter.20.quest.100.title: Archwood logs
chapter.20.quest.101.description.1:
In Ars Nouveau, the power system for machines is called &9Source&r.


To start collecting some Source, we'll need a Source Jar.


Source can also be moved with buckets, or by breaking and picking up Source Jars.
chapter.20.quest.101.subtitle: Storing Source
chapter.20.quest.103.description.1: In this skyblock, &dAmethyst Geodes&r can be found underground in &7Ancient Soul Sand Valleys&r in &2The Other
chapter.20.quest.104.description.1:
Using our Enchanting Apparatus structure, we'll want to craft our first seed, the &5Magebloom Seed&r.


This will be used to create us some magical clothing!
chapter.20.quest.104.subtitle: Growing Magic
chapter.20.quest.104.title: Magebloom Seed
chapter.20.quest.108.description.1:
The Volcanic Sourcelink generates Source by consuming burnable items. Archwood logs will generate bonus Source.


As it burns items, it will convert nearby stone into lava.


This also generates Lava Lilys.
chapter.20.quest.109.description.1:
Runic Chalk is used to draw permanent Runes on that ground. These runes will cast spells on entities that walk over them.


To attach a spell to a rune, inscribe a &eSpell Parchment&r using a Scribe's Table.


Note: The Rune will need Source to operate.
chapter.20.quest.109.subtitle: Placeable Spells
chapter.20.quest.125.description.1:
While holding your Spellbook, you can press C to open up the spell creation page.


Each spell must have a form. You start off with 3 basic forms: Projectile, Self-cast, and Touch.


For the Effect, this determines what happens when you cast the spell. You can have up to 9 effects per spell.


For starters, you have Harm and Break.


Select one Form and one Effect, name your spell, and click create!
chapter.20.quest.125.task.1.title: Creating Your First Spell
chapter.20.quest.126.description.1:
In the bottom left of your screen, you'll see a bar. This bar is your mana pool!


There are several ways to increase your mana pool, or increase the efficiency of your spells as you progress through the mod. Upgrading your spellbook can also increase your mana!
chapter.20.quest.126.subtitle: Mage Power
chapter.20.quest.126.task.1.title: Mana
chapter.20.quest.127.description.1: To create Source Gems, we'll need to put either Lapis or Amethyst Shards into the Imbuement Chamber. Over time, these will convert to Source Gems!
chapter.20.quest.127.title: &5Source Gems
chapter.20.quest.128.description.1:
The &6Dowsing Rod&r gives you Magic Find and Scrying when used.


This allows you to see nearby magic creatures as well as helping you find amethyst!
chapter.20.quest.128.subtitle: Magic Finder
chapter.20.quest.129.subtitle: Generates Source from Mob Deaths and Animal Breeding
chapter.20.quest.130.description.1:
The &9Alchemical Sourcelink&r produces Source from adjacent potion jars.


The amount of source varies per potion and complexity.
chapter.20.quest.130.subtitle: Power through Potions
chapter.20.quest.131.description.1:
Source Berries produce more Source than other sources.


This will also convert grass or dirt into Mycelium in a 3x3 area around it. It will also grow mushrooms around it if the space is empty.
chapter.20.quest.131.subtitle: Generates Source from Nearby Food
chapter.20.quest.132.description.1:
Placing this near growing plants or saplings will provide Source. Archwood trees provide more Source!


Note: Bonemealing does not produce Source.
chapter.20.quest.132.subtitle: Creates Source using the growth of Plants
chapter.20.quest.133.description.1: With Source Gems, you can get started crafting the various machines by creating &5Arcane Stones&r.
chapter.20.quest.133.subtitle: Magical Rocks
chapter.20.quest.133.title: Arcane Stone
chapter.20.quest.134.description.1: Used to inscribe spells on with the Scribe's Table.
chapter.20.quest.135.description.1: The Dominion Wand is used for controlling the creatures you might encounter in the world! Each being responds differently to the wand, so make sure to read up in the Worn Notebook!
chapter.20.quest.135.title: Summoning Help!
chapter.20.quest.136.description.1:
The &9Enchanter's Sword&r allows you to attach a Touch Spell to the sword. 


All spells on the Sword gain 1 additional Amplify augment to the last effect on the spell.


To apply a spell to the sword, use a Scribe's Table. Create the spell without using a form.
chapter.20.quest.137.description.1:
When blocking damage, the &9Enchanter's Shield&r will give the user Mana Regen and Spell Damage for a short amount of time.


Additionally, the shield will repair itself over time using the wearer's mana.
chapter.20.quest.138.description.1:
The &9Enchanter's Mirror&r will apply a self spell when used.


Spells cast with this mirror are discounted and gain additional bonus duration.


To apply a spell, use a Scribe's table. Create a spell without using a form.
chapter.20.quest.139.description.1:
This bow can be inscribed with a spell using a Scribe's Table.


At the cost of mana, arrows will become Spell Arrows and will apply the spell on their target.


If you have no arrows, a spell arrow that deals 0 damage will be cast. If there is not enough mana, regular arrows will be fired instead.


The &9Enchanter's Bow&r can also use special Augment Arrows that empower the inscribed spell.
chapter.20.quest.140.description.1:
The &9Jar of Light&r summons a floating light source that follows you.


The &6Jar of Voiding&r destroys items you pick up in exchange for mana. This can be filtered.


To add or remove an item to be detroyed by the jar, use the jar with the item in your off hand, or use an item on the Scribe's Table with the jar placed on it.


The jar must be on your hotbar to function.
chapter.20.quest.141.description.1: The Ring of Discount provides a small bonus to max mana and mana regen. It also reduces the total cost to cast a spell.
chapter.20.quest.142.description.1: This belt will give random positive potion effects for a short duration. These will vary in strength.
chapter.20.quest.143.description.1:
Have you ever wanted to just hover everywhere you go?


This belt allows you to levitate. To activate, just sneak while in the air, either while falling or from jumping.
chapter.20.quest.144.description.1:
The &9Amulet of Mana Boost&r gives a boost to max mana.


The &6Amulet of Mana Regen&r gives a boost to your mana regen.
chapter.20.quest.144.title: The Amulets
chapter.20.quest.145.description.1:
The &9Caster's Wand&r only accepts a single spell, and is inscribed using the Scribe's Table.


Wand spells always start with Projectile > Accelerate, and MUST be inscribed with a spell that does not have another method (like touch, self, etc).


This allows you to cast spells beyond the 10 spell cap. If you want to use Break, just inscribe the wand with Break by itself.
chapter.20.quest.69.description.1:
Tier 2 Glyphs require 5 levels of experience to be made.


They also require a &9Mage's Spell Book&r to create.
chapter.20.quest.69.title: 等級 2 魔符
chapter.20.quest.70.description.1: Tier 1 Glyphs require 3 levels of experience to be made.
chapter.20.quest.70.title: 等級 1 魔符
chapter.20.quest.71.description.1:
Tier 3 Glyphs require 10 levels of experience to be made.


They also require an &6Archmage's Spell Book&r.
chapter.20.quest.71.title: 等級 3 魔符
chapter.20.quest.72.description.1:
When your Magebloom seeds.... bloom, you can use the Magebloom to create Fibers.


These are used to craft several items, including your first set of magical armor, the &eNovice Armor&r.
chapter.20.quest.73.description.1:
Infusing Magebloom Fiber with Blaze Powder makes it even stronger!


These are used to create the Mage Armor.
chapter.20.quest.74.description.1:
Unlike Skyrim, you don't have to cast a single spell to become the Archmage.


If we infuse our Blaze Fibers with Chorus Fruit, we'll get &5End Fibers&r.


These are used to craft the &6Archmage Armor&r.
chapter.20.quest.74.subtitle: Becoming the Archmage
chapter.20.quest.75.description.1:
The &9Enchanting Apparatus&r is used to craft various items within the mod. It requires Source to work.


It is also a multiblock structure that utilizes Arcane Pedestals to craft.


Start by placing an Arcane Core in the ground, then place the Enchanting Apparatus on top of it. Surround the Apparatus with Arcane Pedestals, like shown in the image.
chapter.20.quest.75.title: Enchanting Apparatus
chapter.20.quest.76.description.1:
Arcane Pedestals are needed for the Ritual Brazier and crafting items with an Enchanting Apparatus.


Go ahead and make yourself 8 of them!
chapter.20.quest.76.subtitle: Fancy Tables
chapter.20.quest.76.title: Arcane Pedestals
chapter.20.quest.92.description.1:
If you want to cast better spells, you'll need a &6Scribe's Table&r to unlock new glyphs for your spellbook.


There are 3 tiers of glyphs to unlock, and each one requires some experience and items.


The Scribe's Table is also used to attach spells to Spell Parchments. To do this, place a Spell Parchment on the table, select the spell in your Spellbook, then sneak right-click the book on the table.


To create a Glyph, right-click on the Scribe's Table with your spellbook. Search for the glyph you want to make, then click Select at the bottom. Right-click the table with the items required, and the glyph will be created. Use the glyph to learn it.


Note: The table can pull items from nearby inventories.
chapter.20.quest.92.reward.1.title: 隨機等級 1 的魔符
chapter.20.quest.92.subtitle: Upgrading Spells
chapter.20.quest.94.description.1:
To get started, you'll need to craft yourself a &6Novice Spellbook&r.


This is where you create and store your spells.


Hitting the &9C&r key will open up the "Create a Spell" page. On the left, there are several tabs, but the main 3 are: Spell Creation, Color Picker, and Familiars.


This spellbook will only allow you to create and use Tier 1 Glyphs. To create better spells, you'll need to upgrade your Spellbook!
chapter.20.quest.94.subtitle: Our First Spellbook
chapter.20.quest.95.description.1:
This is the next upgrade to your Spellbook!


This will increase your overall mana and mana regen, as well as unlocking the ability to create and use Tier 2 Glyphs.
chapter.20.quest.95.reward.1.title: 隨機等級 1 的魔符
chapter.20.quest.96.description.1:
To create the final tier of your Spellbook, you'll need to have killed the &6Wilden Chimera&r.


This is a Ritual that you'll need to complete using a &9Ritual Brazier&r.
chapter.20.quest.97.description.1:
The &9Ritual Brazier&r is used to cast rituals. It can also be used for decoration. If you want to light the Brazier, use a Light spell on it.


To perform rituals, you'll need Arcane Pedestals as well. As there are so many rituals to cast, make sure to check out each of them using the &6Worn Notebook&r!


This can be done by holding Ctrl on the Ritual Table while the book is in your inventory.
chapter.20.quest.98.description.1:
The &9Potion Jar&r stores up to 100 potions. You can remove them by using an empty bottle or a potion flask on the jar.


Wixies will use these jars during Potion Autocrafting.
chapter.20.quest.98.subtitle: Storing Potions
chapter.20.quest.99.description.1:
To create one of the main crafting items in Ars, the &9Source Gem&r, we'll need to make an &6Imbuement Chamber&r.


The Imbuement Chamber requires Source to imbue items. It produces a small amount of Source by itself, but can also use Source Jars as a power source.


Several recipes also require Arcane Pedestals to be placed around it as well.
chapter.20.quest.99.subtitle: Creating Source Gems
chapter.20.title: Ars Nouveau
chapter.21.quest.1.task.1.title: 植物魔法
chapter.21.quest.1.title: 植物魔法
chapter.21.quest.11.description.1:
這兩個物品可以讓你透過鐵路系統來用礦車帶著你魔力池

這兩個物品可以讓你透過礦車魔力池帶到你的&a植物魔法&f裝置。
chapter.21.quest.11.title: 移動式魔力
chapter.21.quest.2.description.1: &e花藥台&f可以讓你製作所需的功能性與生產性花花。
chapter.21.quest.2.title: 花藥台
chapter.21.quest.3.description.1: 這朵花將幫助你製作在&a植物魔法&f中廣泛使用的基礎材料
chapter.21.quest.43.description.1: 不幸的是，這還沒有工廠版本。
chapter.21.quest.47.title: 便攜魔力
chapter.21.quest.5.description.1: 將&b魔力&f從花和池子發送到其他設備的早期遊戲方式。
chapter.21.quest.55.title: 使用魔力
chapter.21.quest.57.description.1: &e花肥&f可以用來成長更多&e神秘花朵&f，類似於骨粉種草。
chapter.21.quest.57.title: 有拿到花嗎？
chapter.21.quest.60.title: 媒體網路
chapter.21.quest.63.description.1: 在終界中撈取空氣獲得
chapter.21.quest.7.description.1: 這朵花能夠轉換成其他種材料，查看 JEI 來了解更多資訊。
chapter.21.quest.9.description.1: &a植物魔法&f的主要工具，你將會在整個模組中持續使用到。
chapter.21.title: 植物魔法
chapter.22.quest.1.description.1:
Welcome to &cBlood Magic&f!


To get started, check your &eEccentric Tome&r for the Blood Magic guidebook. You'll also get one for completing this quest!


The guidebook contains all of the information about the mod if you ever need any help.
chapter.22.quest.1.task.1.title: Blood Magic
chapter.22.quest.1.title: Welcome to &cBlood Magic!
chapter.22.quest.10.description.1:
The &4Hellfire Forge&r is one of the main blocks needed for working in Blood Magic.


It is powered by Demon Will, and can be used to create several items including the &bSentient Sword&r.
chapter.22.quest.10.title: &4Hellfire Forge&r
chapter.22.quest.11.description.1:
We can't use Soul Snares forever.


The Sentient Sword allows you to collect Demon Will a lot easier. Simply kill a hostile mob with the sword, and the mob will drop Demon Will.
chapter.22.quest.11.title: The Sentient Sword
chapter.22.quest.12.description.1:
Demon Will stacks up very quickly in your inventory.


We're going to need a lot of it, so we'll need to create a way to store all of it. Creating a &9Tartaric Gem&r is just what we need.


The &bPetty Tartaric Gem&r is what we'll spend our first Demon Will on. This will store up to a maximum of 64 Will.


Note: If you drop any Demon Will you have in your inventory, the Gem will absorb it into its storage.
chapter.22.quest.12.title: Storing Demonic Will
chapter.22.quest.13.description.1: An upgrade to our Will storage. This will hold a max of 256 Will.
chapter.22.quest.14.description.1: This will hold a max of 1024 Will.
chapter.22.quest.15.description.1: This is the maximum storage item for Demon Will, and will hold 4096 Will max.
chapter.22.quest.16.description.1:
Combing Reinforced Slate with some blood in our new Altar will give us Imbued Slates.


This is the next upgrade for our Blood Magic journey.
chapter.22.quest.17.description.1: This rune increases the total capacity of the Altar by 20% for each Capacity rune.
chapter.22.quest.18.description.1: Increases the flow rate of LP in and out of the Altar when pumping to and from an external tank by 20% per rune.
chapter.22.quest.19.description.1:
The last piece of Slate that has any use...


yet.
chapter.22.quest.2.description.1:
To get started with Blood Magic, we'll need to collect some blood.


To do this, we'll need to craft the &dSacrificial Knife&r and the &4Blood Altar&r. 


Go ahead and place the Altar somewhere with plenty of space around it. We might want to expand on it more in the future.


To acquire blood, stand by the Altar and... well... use the knife. You'll take a little damage, but &oit's for the cause&r.


Each stab will generate around 200 LP.
chapter.22.quest.2.title: Collecting &cBlood
chapter.22.quest.20.description.1: This rune increases the capacity of the Altar by a multiplicative amount of 7.5% per rune. These apply after regular Capacity Runes.
chapter.22.quest.21.description.1:
This rune creates a 1000LP internal buffer whenever the Altar is not being used for crafting or filling blood orbs.


Whenever an item is placed inside of the altar, it will instantly consume the stored charge and apply it to the item.


No more waiting once placed!
chapter.22.quest.22.description.1:
You can't even use this for anything that I know of.


You are too powerful.
chapter.22.quest.23.description.1:
This rune accelerates the operations of other runes, like the Charging or Displacement Rune.


It removes 1 tick of delay per rune, down to a minimum of 1 operation per tick.
chapter.22.quest.24.description.1:
Tau Fruit can be obtained from loot chests within the Hidden Realm. You'll need this to upgrade your Altar even further!


Once collected, the fruit can be planted to farm it. However, it has 2 potential products instead of one.


Growing the fruit naturally will result in more Tau Fruit, which can be turned into Oil. But what if we give it some blood......
chapter.22.quest.25.description.1:
Just like everything in this pack, &cthe fruit thirsts for blood&r. Plant the fruit and force a mob on top of it.


It will drain the life force of the mob to become Saturated Tau.
chapter.22.quest.26.description.1:
While not fully implemented yet, the &6Alchemical Reaction Chamber&r functions like a Furnace.


This is currently the only way to obtain &cWeak Blood Shards&r, which we'll need to upgrade our Altar.
chapter.22.quest.27.subtitle: Holds a max of 150k LP
chapter.22.quest.28.subtitle: Holds a max of 1M LP
chapter.22.quest.29.description.1: With our Saturated Tau and our Alchemical Reaction Chamber, we can make the required materials to upgrade our Altar and Blood Orb, the &4Weak Blood Shard&r.
chapter.22.quest.3.description.1:
We'll want to infuse Life Essence (aka LP or Blood) into some stone.


Placing stone in the Altar with 1000 LP inside will create Blank Slates. You'll need a lot of these.
chapter.22.quest.3.title: Making Slates
chapter.22.quest.30.description.1:
Now we'll need to make the Dusk version of the Ritual Diviner.


This gives us access to even more rituals, including the ritual that gets us to the Demon Realm.
chapter.22.quest.30.title: Tier II rituals
chapter.22.quest.31.description.1:
Before we can craft the &cHellfire Forge&r, we'll need a way to power it by acquiring &bDemon Will&r.


To start collecting it, we'll need to create some &dSoul Snares&r that we can use on mobs.


Once you use a few of these on a mob, white particles will appear around them. Slay them, and you'll acquire Demonic Will.
chapter.22.quest.31.title: Collecting Demonic Will
chapter.22.quest.32.description.1:
The &9Alchemy Table&r can craft various objects, catalysts, and more by using LP from a player's Soul Network (aka using a Blood Orb).


This table can also convert many things, like Rotten Flesh to Leather, Wool to String, etc. It's pretty useful!
chapter.22.quest.33.description.1:
There are several Rune types that can change how an Altar functions.


For example, Speed Runes increase the speed of all crafting operations within the Altar by 20% per rune.


This is the first rune you can use to upgrade your Altar.
chapter.22.quest.33.title: Altering the Altar
chapter.22.quest.34.description.1:
This rune increases the amount of LP gained from getting blood from Players. :D


Each rune gives a bonus of 10% additively.
chapter.22.quest.35.description.1:
To upgrade our Altar to Tier 3, we need to get a lot more runes. 28 total to be exact.


You need to place 5 Blood Runes (Blank or better) one block down and two blocks away from the Tier 2 Altar runes, along each edge.


You'll then want to create a pillar in each corner out of any block, with a pillar cap of Glowstone sitting one block higher than the Altar itself.


If you want to check if the Altar was built correctly, use a &9Divination Sigil&r to check the Tier.


Note: Any non-air block can be used for the pillar, as long as the cap is Glowstone.
chapter.22.quest.35.subtitle: Use the Guidebook for help building this!
chapter.22.quest.35.title: Upgrading the Altar: Tier 3
chapter.22.quest.36.description.1:
To upgrade our Altar, we'll need 56 total Blood Runes (Blank or better).


We'll do just like we did last time. Go one block down and two blocks out, then place 7 Blood Runes along each edge. You're basically making a pyramid at this point.


We want to create pillars in each of the corners, starting &9above&r the new ring of runes. These pillars are 5 tall, with the pillar cap being made of &cBloodstone Bricks&r or &cLarge Bloodstone Bricks&r. 


Instead of a picture, look in your Sanguine Scientiem and search for the Blood Altar section. Scroll until you find the Tier 4 Altar, and all of the information is there. You can even click the eye to visualize the structure.
chapter.22.quest.36.title: Upgrading Our Altar: Tier 4
chapter.22.quest.37.subtitle: Holds a max of 25k LP
chapter.22.quest.38.description.1:
With our Alchemy Table and our Orb full of Blood, we want to make some &9Arcane Ashes&r.


With the Ashes, we'll be able to draw a circle on the ground, known as an Alchemy Array. You can insert 2 items in by right-clicking, and will either craft a new item or perform an action, like turning day into night!
chapter.22.quest.38.subtitle: We're drawing on the ground now.
chapter.22.quest.39.description.1:
The &9Divination Sigil&r is the first Sigil we'll be making.


This Sigil has two primary uses:


1) When you right-click with the Sigil in your hand, it will display the amount of LP you have in your Soul Network.


2) If you right-click a Blood Altar with it, you'll see how much LP is stored, the max it can store, and what tier the altar is.
chapter.22.quest.4.description.1:
To craft even more items using blood, we'll want to upgrade our altar by surrounding it in &9Blank Runes&r.


If you want, you can replace the Blank Runes in each of the cardinal directions to runes like the &6Speed Rune&r. These runes can affect how the Altar functions.


Below is an example of how you'd build a Tier 2 Altar, but you can also visualize it in the guidebook.


Note: Speed Runes are the only runes available (besides Blank Runes) until you make a Tier 2 Altar, but can be replaced later on.
chapter.22.quest.4.title: Upgrading Our Altar to Tier 2
chapter.22.quest.40.description.1:
When held in hand, you can right-click to create a water source block for 100LP. Not bad huh?


Unless you don't have 100LP. In that case, it'll just take your health. :)
chapter.22.quest.41.description.1:
With the Lava Sigil in hand, if you right-click, you'll create a source block of lava for the low low cost of 1,000 LP.


If you don't have enough LP, that's cool too. It'll just take 5 hearts from you. No biggie.
chapter.22.quest.42.description.1:
While not required, the Ritual Diviner is great to have as it shows exactly how the Ritual is built, and helps build it. (You should totally make one.)


To build a ritual, shift-right click with the Ritual Diviner in the air until you find the ritual you want to create. You can shift-left click to go back as well.


Start by doing the Edge of the Hidden Realm ritual, as we'll need a few items from the dimension to get started.


Once selected with the Ritual Diviner, right click on a Master Ritual Stone until the structure is complete. You will need a bunch of Ritual Stones to perform these rituals. Once the structure is fully built, you can right click the Master Ritual Stone with a Weak Activation Crystal to activate it.
chapter.22.quest.43.description.1:
To upgrade our Altar to Tier 5, we'll need a total of 108 Runes, as well as 4 Demonite Blocks.


Follow the Sanguine Scietiem (the guide book for the mod) for a detailed guide on how to build the structure.


You want to start by going one block down and three blocks out from the previous set of runes of your Tier 4 Altar. You want to place 15 runes along each side.


In the corners of the newly created ring, place a Demonite Block with one empty space on each side.
chapter.22.quest.43.title: The Tier 5 Altar
chapter.22.quest.44.description.1:
Once you make it to the Hidden Realm, you'll find a chest with some basic loot in it.


Keep an eye out for &9Iron Keys&r. These unlock the extra rooms within the Hidden Realm, giving access to even more loot.
chapter.22.quest.44.title: Dungeon Keys
chapter.22.quest.45.description.1: Using loot from the Demon Realm, you can upgrade each rune to double its effect.
chapter.22.quest.45.title: Reinforced Runes
chapter.22.quest.46.description.1:
&6Teleposition Sigil&r - Will teleport the user to a linked Teleposer at the cost of 1000LP. You can shift-click with the sigil on a Teleposer to set the location.


&9Suppression Sigil&r - You can push liquids away from you in a 6 block radius. It's pretty cool.
chapter.22.quest.47.description.1:
Performing the &cPathway to the Endless Realm&r ritual will give you access to the proper Demon Realm.


This is the only place where you can find &9Demonite Ore&r. This is used to create the Tier 5 Altar.


There is also a ton of rare loot, so make sure to keep an eye out for Intricate Hellforged Parts.
chapter.22.quest.47.title: &cThe Demon Realm
chapter.22.quest.48.description.1:
&9Air Sigil&r - Right Click to throw you in a direction you are facing for 50 LP.


&cVoid Sigil&r - Right Click on any liquid to void it, costing 50 LP.


&6Seer's Sigil&r - A better version of the Divination Sigil. Gives more info when looking at Altars.


&aMiner's Sigil&r - Shift-Right Click to use 100LP per 5 seconds to give yourself a Haste buff.


&2Green Gove Sigil&r - Right Clicking a crop that is growable will give it a bonemeal effect for 150LP. Shift-Right Clicking will consume 150LP per 5 seconds, increasing the growth rate of a 7x7x5 area.
chapter.22.quest.48.title: Tier 2 Sigils
chapter.22.quest.49.description.1:
&cBlood Lamp&r - Launches a blood light when used. Costs 10LP


&9Holding&r - Holds up to 5 other Sigils at a time, providing their passive effects and allowing you to activate them on a while. You can keybind buttons to access the inventory and cycle through the Sigils.


&6Magnetism&r - Activate for a magnet up to 7 blocks at the cost of 50LP every 5 seconds.
chapter.22.quest.5.description.1: With our Altar now at Tier 2, we can make even better Runes. We'll need some Reinforced slate to continue our journey in Blood Magic, including doing some Rituals.
chapter.22.quest.50.description.1:
You can create Living Equipment by making some Binding Reagents in an Alchemy Table. You'll also need at least a Common Tartaric Gem in order to hold the Demon Will required.


&9Living Equipment&r is the equivalent in durability of Diamond Armor, and can be repaired in an Anvil using Binding Reagents.


It starts off as the equivalent of Iron, but has Upgrade Points that can be spent to train it in specific ways. It starts with 100, but there are ways to increase this limit.


As you use it, it will "learn" from you. You can see what it has learned so far by holding left shift while looking at it.
chapter.22.quest.50.title: Living Armor
chapter.22.quest.6.description.1:
The &9Weak Blood Orb&r is used to store blood (or LP). It can be used as a way to transport blood to and from Altars. It also is used in several crafting recipes.


To craft this, you'll need to place a diamond on top of the Blood Altar, then generate enough LP to craft it.


To charge a Blood Orb, you can right-click to sacrifice some of your health to the Orb. This also links your Soul to your Soul Network. :)


You can also place the Orb in a Blood Altar that has some LP in it. It'll drain faster the more Speed Runes it has.
chapter.22.quest.6.subtitle: Holds a max of 5k LP
chapter.22.quest.6.title: Portable Blood Storage
chapter.22.quest.7.description.1:
With our Tier 3 Altar, we can start performing Rituals.


Rituals require a Master Ritual Stone and enough regular Ritual Stones to create.


Start by crafting a bunch of Ritual Stones as well as a Master Ritual Stone. These are the basic blocks we'll need to start doing rituals.
chapter.22.quest.7.title: Tier I Rituals
chapter.22.quest.8.description.1: This rune increases the amount of LP gained from taking blood away from non-player entities. Each one gives a bonus of 10% additively per rune.
chapter.22.quest.9.description.1:
Now you can stab others to use their Blood instead!


Stabbing any mob within 2 blocks of your Altar with one of these will insta-kill them and drain their LP into your Altar!


If you have Runes of Sacrifice around your Altar, you'll get more per kill.


I'm also totally not giving you 16 eggs for you to potentially get chickens for blood. Totally just for cooking.
chapter.22.quest.9.subtitle: Tired of Stabbing Yourself?
chapter.22.title: Blood Magic
chapter.23.quest.1.description.1:
Forbidden \&\ Arcanus adds new ways to get better armor, enchants, and more!


This magic-themed mod has amazing animations, as well as some overpowered items like the &6Eternal Stella&r.
chapter.23.quest.1.task.1.title: Welcome to Forbidden \&\ Arcanus!
chapter.23.quest.1.title: Welcome to &5Forbidden \&\ Arcanus!
chapter.23.quest.10.description.1: The &9Quantum Catcher&r is used to capture and transport mobs.
chapter.23.quest.10.title: Entity Tools
chapter.23.quest.11.description.1:
Found randomly in loot chests from the End City.


When used, it grants 5 minutes of creative flight.
chapter.23.quest.12.description.1: This gives X-Ray vision for mobs, highlighting them from afar to make it easier to spot them.
chapter.23.quest.12.subtitle: Highlights Mobs when Activated
chapter.23.quest.13.description.1:
Using this bone meal on Farmland will convert it to Magical Farmland.


Crops will produce double the output when grown on Magical Farmland.
chapter.23.quest.13.subtitle: Use on Farmland to make it Magical!
chapter.23.quest.14.subtitle: Can Infect Villagers and Horses
chapter.23.quest.15.subtitle: Arrow Go Boom
chapter.23.quest.16.subtitle: Leaves an AoE Cloud that damages living mobs
chapter.23.quest.17.description.1:
These can be planted to grow Arcane Gold Nuggets.


To create one, you'll need to find Yellow Orchids.
chapter.23.quest.17.subtitle: Growing Gold
chapter.23.quest.18.description.1:
Crafted with skulls, bones, and cloth, this armor is slightly stronger than Iron.


It's also really cool looking.
chapter.23.quest.18.subtitle: Armor of the Dead
chapter.23.quest.18.title: Mortem Armor
chapter.23.quest.19.description.1: &6Arcane Gold&r can be used to craft armor, which is stronger than Diamonds!
chapter.23.quest.19.subtitle: Oooo....Shiny
chapter.23.quest.19.title: &6Arcane Gold Armor
chapter.23.quest.2.description.1:
Found within the Dark Forest biome, the Edelwood Tree looks like a small tree that has been chopped in half.


You'll need to break the branches off and collect the logs, as these are used for crafting various items within the mod.


With no natural generation to be found. These saplings can be bought from the Market
chapter.23.quest.2.title: Edelwood Trees
chapter.23.quest.20.title: &6Arcane Golden Sword
chapter.23.quest.21.title: &6Arcane Golden Tools
chapter.23.quest.22.description.1: Combining a Dragon Head with a Mystical Dagger will give you &9Dragon Scales&r.
chapter.23.quest.22.subtitle: Dragon Scales, Dragon Scales.....
chapter.23.quest.22.title: Dragon Scales
chapter.23.quest.23.subtitle: Better than Netherite
chapter.23.quest.23.title: &1Draco Arcanus Armor&r
chapter.23.quest.24.description.1:
The Dragon Scale can be made into a Golden and Aquatic Dragon Scales.


These are mainly used to craft &dTyr Armor&r. It is also needed in the ATM Star recipe.
chapter.23.quest.25.description.1:
Used to corrupt Souls and Runes. You'll need this for later.


If you throw down Dark Matter, then throw down Corrupti Dust, it'll create a Black Hole. Feed it small entities like Arrows or Experience Orbs, and it'll produce Xpetrified Orbs.
chapter.23.quest.26.description.1:
Using our Arcane Crystal Dust, we'll need to combine it with other dusts and powders to create Mundabiter Dust.


This dust is used in several recipes, as well as activating the Hephaestus Forge.
chapter.23.quest.26.subtitle: Let the Dusts Combine
chapter.23.quest.26.title: Mundabitur Dust
chapter.23.quest.27.description.1:
The &6Arcane Gold Ingot&r is needed to continue your progression in the mod.


It's used for a lot of stuff, and it's also pretty.
chapter.23.quest.27.title: &6Arcane Gold Ingots
chapter.23.quest.28.title: &5Tyr Armor
chapter.23.quest.29.description.1:
To create the &6ATM Star&r, you'll need several items from Forbidden and Arcanus.


You'll need a Dark Soul, a Golden Dragon Scale, and an Arcane Dragon Egg.
chapter.23.quest.29.task.1.title: Dragon Soul
chapter.23.quest.3.subtitle: A Silk-Touch Pickaxe
chapter.23.quest.30.description.1:
This Dragon Egg is needed for the ATM Star recipe.


It's also a cool decoration piece.
chapter.23.quest.31.description.1:
Killing passive mobs will increase your corruption. Killing &9Aureal Entities&r has a higher chance to increase your corruption.


Be careful! At higher levels of corruption, negative things will happen!


Making a Sanity Meter will give your UI an upgrade to show your total corruption, for those who want to hit new high scores and such.
chapter.23.quest.31.subtitle: Am I going insane?
chapter.23.quest.31.title: Sanity
chapter.23.quest.32.description.1: You've probably already acquired some Darkstone, but we'll need it to craft the forge.
chapter.23.quest.32.title: Prepping For the Forge
chapter.23.quest.33.description.1:
We'll be using all of that Darkstone to create the &1Hephaestus Forge&r.


Once you have all of the blocks needed, you'll need to build the platform for the forge.


Once built, place a Smithing Table in the center, then sneak+right-click with a piece of Mundabitur Dust.


To see how to build the platform, search in JEI for the forge, then hold W to view the ponder.
chapter.23.quest.33.title: &1The Hephaestus Forge
chapter.23.quest.34.description.1:
The &9Lens of Veritatis&r is used to see Aureal entities.


These are entities that will grant Aureal when killed, but will also increase your corruption....
chapter.23.quest.35.description.1:
Smelting &9Edelwood&r will give you Dark Matter.


You can make Black Holes with this.
chapter.23.quest.36.description.1:
Blood is collected by crafting Test Tubes, then killing mobs with the Mystical Dagger.


Note: The Test Tube must be in your inventory when killing mobs.
chapter.23.quest.36.title: &4Blood
chapter.23.quest.37.description.1:
&dAureal Bottles&r can be found in loot chests, but they can also be crafted using Arcane Crystal Dust.


You can also generate Aureal with Arcane Crystal Obelisks.
chapter.23.quest.37.title: &9Aureal
chapter.23.quest.38.description.1: Souls are gathered by creating a &9Soul Extractor&r, and then using it on Soul Sand.
chapter.23.quest.38.title: &dSouls
chapter.23.quest.39.description.1: This goes in the right side of the forge.
chapter.23.quest.39.subtitle: Experience in a bottle
chapter.23.quest.39.title: &aBottle O' Enchanting
chapter.23.quest.4.description.1:
The Mystical Dagger is used to break Dragon Heads down to Dragon Scales.


When killing mobs with it with a test tube in your inventory, it will also collect blood.
chapter.23.quest.40.description.1:
The Forge requires 4 different items to be powered: Aureal, Souls, Blood, and Experience.


To learn more, follow the corner quests.
chapter.23.quest.40.task.1.title: Powering the Forge
chapter.23.quest.41.description.1:
To enchant items, you'll need Darkstone Pedestals placed around the Forge.


Make sure to place these on the Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone.
chapter.23.quest.41.title: Darkstone Pedestals
chapter.23.quest.42.description.1:
To perform a ritual, place the ingredients on the Arcane Pedestals.


You'll need a &9Blacksmith's Gavel&r to activate the ritual. To do this, right click on the Forge with the Gavel.
chapter.23.quest.42.task.1.title: Blacksmith Gavel
chapter.23.quest.42.title: Performing Rituals
chapter.23.quest.43.description.1:
The &6Stella Eternal&r has 3 charges, and when right-clicked, it can fully repair all of your items in your inventory.


The main purpose of this is to give the enchant &9Unbreakable&r to an item, which is done by combining it with the tool in a Smithing Table.
chapter.23.quest.43.title: &dStella Eternal
chapter.23.quest.44.description.1: This item can be combined with a tool to add the &6Fiery&r enchant, which auto-smelts blocks when harvested, or sets things ablaze.
chapter.23.quest.45.description.1:
This stuff is everywhere.


It can be used to give yourself experience, or used to make the Stella Eternal.
chapter.23.quest.46.subtitle: Dragon Tools
chapter.23.quest.46.title: &1Draco Tools
chapter.23.quest.47.description.1: The Scepter shoots out energy orbs when charged up with Right-Click. If a mob is hit, it'll strike it with lightning.
chapter.23.quest.47.subtitle: Go Pew Pew
chapter.23.quest.47.title: &1Draco Weapons
chapter.23.quest.48.description.1:
To create an Arcane Crystal Obelisk, place down an Arcane Polished Darkstone block, then place two Arcane Crystal Blocks on top of it.


Right-click with Mundabitur Dust and you'll create the obelisk.


When placed on a Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone block on the Hephaestus Forge structure, it will slowly generate Aureal over time.
chapter.23.quest.48.task.1.title: Arcane Crystal Obelisks
chapter.23.quest.49.description.1: The Hephaestus Forge is also used for creating Enchants. Check out JEI to see all of the different Enchants you can create!
chapter.23.quest.49.task.1.title: Enchantments
chapter.23.quest.5.description.1:
The Edelwood bucket can store more than one bucket of liquid, and can also be used to capture small animals like chickens or squids.


You'll need the Permafrost enchant to use it to carry Lava.
chapter.23.quest.6.description.1: This is the main resource in the mod. Go out and mine some!
chapter.23.quest.6.title: Arcane Crystals
chapter.23.quest.7.description.1:
You'll find the Stella Arcanum ore deep underground.


Careful when mining.
chapter.23.quest.7.subtitle: This Goes Boom Too
chapter.23.quest.8.description.1:
Smelting down Arcane Crystals will give you Arcane Crystal Dust.


This is used for most of the items in the mod.
chapter.23.quest.9.description.1: Breaking spawners will now drop &9Spawner Scraps&r.
chapter.23.title: Forbidden and Arcanus
chapter.24.quest.1.description.1:
歡迎來到&9暮光森林&r！


要製作一個前往暮光森林的傳送門，需要先挖一個 2x2 的洞，並灌滿水。拿花朵圍繞洞的邊緣，並丟一顆鑽石進去。


索爾會在你做對的時候給你訊號。
chapter.24.quest.1.subtitle: 製作傳送門
chapter.24.quest.1.task.1.title: 前往暮光森林！
chapter.24.quest.1.title: 暮光森林
chapter.24.quest.10.description.1:
希臘神話中臭名昭彰的多頭野獸。


遠距離攻擊沒說那麼有效，這意味著你需要近距離攻擊。


當擊敗時，你將可以踏入黑暗森林尋找下一個魔王。
chapter.24.quest.10.subtitle: 燃燒沼澤
chapter.24.quest.10.title: 九頭蛇殺手
chapter.24.quest.11.description.1:
在黑暗森林裡，你會發現一個通往地下的結構。


要進入的話，你需要放置戰利品在附近的戰利品座上。


在第三層中，你將會找到幻影騎士。擊敗它來挑戰下一個魔王。
chapter.24.quest.11.subtitle: 最黑暗的森林
chapter.24.quest.11.title: 踏入黑暗森林
chapter.24.quest.12.description.1:
在黑暗森林中，你將會找到黑暗之塔。


要進入黑暗之塔，請從最底部尋找重現方塊進入。並一路穿過迷宮抵達最終一層，與暮光幽靈戰鬥。


建議使用遠程武器殺死暮光幽靈。魔王層有四個幽靈陷阱，可以拿來傷害暮光幽靈。


它使用你所殺死的高塔迷你幽靈來進行充能，並使用紅石來進行發射。你不必使用它們，不過它們可以證明是有用的。
chapter.24.quest.12.subtitle: 黑暗卡蒙之塔
chapter.24.quest.12.title: 熾熱的眼淚
chapter.24.quest.13.description.1:
擊敗暮光幽靈後，你將解鎖冰雪森林的生態域。


那邊有許多生物要戰鬥，但要繼續前進，那麼你需要殺死雪怪首領。


你可以在巨大的雪怪山洞中找到雪怪首領。擊敗它來繼續前進。
chapter.24.quest.13.title: 踏入冰雪森林！
chapter.24.quest.14.description.1:
擊敗雪怪首領你會解鎖暮光冰川。在這裡，你會看到可愛可愛的小企鵝與冰雪女王。


冰雪女王將在極光宮殿的最頂層等著你。它會招喚冰晶體來保護自己。


它也會重擊地面的冰塊，破壞地板並造成巨大的傷害。


你只能攻擊她的上半身，因為他的其他部位有著冰塊的保護。（嗯，不被自己窒息？）


在擊敗冰雪女王之後，你將會解鎖通往暮光高原的道路。
chapter.24.quest.14.title: 晴空萬里之時
chapter.24.quest.15.description.1:
有了巨人之鎬，你將想要返回巨魔洞穴尋找巨型黑曜石。


使用巨人之鎬來破壞它，你會找到一些戰利品。你想拿著灰燼之燈來繼續旅途。
chapter.24.quest.16.description.1:
使用魔豆與培養土，你會想要在暮光高原中找一片大雲。


將魔豆種在培養土裡，並等它長出豆莖直至雲端。在上方你將會找到巨人。


你將需要殺死巨人礦工，奪取它們的鎬子來繼續前進。
chapter.24.quest.16.subtitle: 這巨人就像是我，但同時也不像是我。
chapter.24.quest.17.description.1: 來自納迦身上的鱗片，可以拿來製作盔甲。並不是特別強，但看起乃不錯。
chapter.24.quest.17.title: 納迦鱗片盔甲
chapter.24.quest.18.description.1:
你想像巫妖一樣發射終界珍珠攻擊？這就是它的權杖。


要重新充能，請在工作台上與終界珍珠融合。
chapter.24.quest.19.description.1:
使用此權杖，你將可以吸乾敵人的血！


要重新充能，請在工作台上與發酵蜘蛛眼融合。
chapter.24.quest.2.description.1:
在暮光森林中，有許多新的物種等著你發覺。


最糟糕的其中之一就是蟬。我建議僅為了成就而殺死它，不過殺死其他暮光的怪物也同樣可以獲得。
chapter.24.quest.2.task.1.title: 寂靜之森
chapter.24.quest.20.description.1:
誰也不想招喚自己的殭屍小兵？


要重新充能，請在工作台上與腐肉融合。
chapter.24.quest.21.description.1:
這個權杖將會招喚護盾在你周圍對你進行保護。


要重新充能，請在工作台上與金蘋果融合。
chapter.24.quest.22.description.1:
是時候該去暮光沼澤了！在暮光沼澤中，你會發現一個外觀獨特的小山，頂部將會有一個入口。這裡是牛頭人迷宮！


在裡面，你將會與新的敵人進行戰鬥（有些會掉迷宮地圖的製作材料）。打倒這些敵人是製作迷宮地圖的必要過程。


這是一張特殊的地圖，可以在牛頭人迷宮周圍繪製地圖。你的小地圖在此沒有任何力量。


你還可以找到迷宮獨有的特殊戰利品在戰利品室中！
chapter.24.quest.22.subtitle: 我想知道我們是否可以找到史瑞克
chapter.24.quest.22.title: 踏入暮光沼澤！
chapter.24.quest.23.description.1:
這張地圖是在暮光森林中旅遊的必備品。


使用空白魔法地圖來製作一個會顯示附近魔王與結構圖標的旅遊地圖。
chapter.24.quest.24.description.1:
這稍微比納迦鱗片強，並可以全套附魔。


你可以通過在暮光森林找&6鋼葉&r來製作。
chapter.24.quest.24.title: 鋼葉盔甲
chapter.24.quest.25.description.1:
這件盔甲可以用&9鐵木&r來製作。


這盔甲也會自動附魔。
chapter.24.quest.25.title: 鐵木盔甲
chapter.24.quest.26.description.1:
九頭蛇會滴下熾熱之血，並可以拿來製作熾熱盔甲。


當穿著全套時，敵人攻擊你時將會著火 10 秒。
chapter.24.quest.26.title: 熾熱盔甲
chapter.24.quest.27.description.1: 有機率在幻影騎士的儲物箱中翻到。
chapter.24.quest.28.description.1: 製作或在幻影騎士的儲物箱中找到。
chapter.24.quest.28.title: 騎士金屬盔甲
chapter.24.quest.29.description.1:
找到謎題羊，給予它彩虹羊毛（16 種不同顏色的羊毛）之者將會獲得它的財富祝福

提示：在謎題羊所在的廢墟之中，頭頂上有一個發射器。可能對你來說有用。
chapter.24.quest.29.title: 衍生
chapter.24.quest.3.description.1:
…… 尚未完成。


作為代替，前往最終高地的巨大城堡，並將門拆掉以獲得大門！


有個狗頭人作為「變數符」生成，但殺死它也不會拿到任何東西。
chapter.24.quest.3.task.1.title: 踏入最終高地
chapter.24.quest.3.title: 最終魔王
chapter.24.quest.30.description.1:
這是一個防止死亡的一次性物品。與其說是死亡，不如說是符咒被消耗掉，你也會獲得短暫的恢復效果。


可以在戰利品儲物箱中找到。
chapter.24.quest.31.description.1: 就像是生命符咒 I 一樣，也同樣是消耗此物品來防止你死亡，但加強版。消耗後你將會恢復你所有血量並獲得恢復四、抗性與火焰保護各三十秒。
chapter.24.quest.32.description.1: 這件物品將會防止你死亡時噴掉你身上的盔甲與手上拿的東西。
chapter.24.quest.33.description.1: 這件物品會在你死亡時保留下你快捷欄的物品。
chapter.24.quest.34.description.1: 這件物品會保留你身上所有的物品當你死亡時。
chapter.24.quest.35.subtitle: 炫砲版落葉吹風機
chapter.24.quest.36.title: 雪怪盔甲
chapter.24.quest.37.description.1: 小雪怪與寒冬狼也會掉製作這件盔甲的材料。
chapter.24.quest.37.subtitle: 可染色！
chapter.24.quest.37.title: 極地皮毛盔甲
chapter.24.quest.38.description.1:
一種在牛頭人迷宮中找到的特殊鎬子。


破壞迷宮牆壁時僅損失耐久度一點，而不是其他種鎬，破壞時會損失十六點耐久度！
chapter.24.quest.38.subtitle: 別進入，陷阱房間？
chapter.24.quest.39.description.1: 從冰雪女王身上掉落，這把弓可以同時射出三支箭矢，而僅消耗身上的一根箭矢。
chapter.24.quest.4.description.1:
你可以在暮光森林中煮各種不同的食物！


你應該成為個美食家嘗試吃所有食物！
chapter.24.quest.4.title: 花式名詞
chapter.24.quest.40.description.1: 從冰雪女王身上掉落，這把弓射出的箭矢將會追蹤你的敵人。不再有未命中的問題！
chapter.24.quest.41.description.1: 在戰利品儲物箱中隨機發現，這把弓可以在擊中目標時給予它十秒緩速。
chapter.24.quest.42.description.1:
這把弓在極光宮殿中十分罕見。


當你用這把弓擊中敵人時，你將會與它交換位置。小心射擊天上的東西！
chapter.24.quest.43.description.1:
一種磁鐵可以吸取任何帶有礦石迷稱的礦物，除了煤炭。


可以在礦山中的儲物箱中找到。
chapter.24.quest.44.description.1:
一把有四十點傷害的劍，但僅有一點耐久度。


如果你要使用它，你可以讓它變成堅不可摧。


這也非常罕見會出現在極光宮殿的戰利品儲物箱中。
chapter.24.quest.45.description.1: 可以在極光宮殿中找到，這把劍會在攻擊到敵人時給予十秒凍結效果。
chapter.24.quest.46.description.1:
這個物品就像是火把發射器。它會發射&6月光蠕蟲&r在目標方塊上，並像是火把一樣點亮周遭。


你可以在礦山的寶藏箱中找到。
chapter.24.quest.47.description.1:
想讓主世界更像是暮光森林一樣嗎？


那麼你可以在主世界的動物身上灑這種粉末，將它們轉化成暮光森林的變種。


你可以在暮光森林中的地牢箱找到。
chapter.24.quest.49.description.1: 將烏鴉羽毛、火炬漿果、螢光石合成起來可以製作魔法地圖核心。
chapter.24.quest.5.description.1:
在森林中很容易迷路。旅行過程中，你會遇到黑曜石的柱子。


這些柱子周圍會徘徊著烏鴉。將其殺死以獲取它們的羽毛，用羽毛繪製暮光森林的地圖！
chapter.24.quest.5.title: 烏鴉羽毛
chapter.24.quest.50.description.1:
使用九頭蛇的熾熱之血，你可以製作多種有用的工具。


熾熱之劍在製作完成時會有燃燒二的附魔效果。


熾熱之鎬則是帶有自動熔煉的功能。
chapter.24.quest.51.description.1: 這是哞菇牛頭人王所掉落的東西。當衝刺時將會造成更多傷害。
chapter.24.quest.52.title: 騎士金屬工具
chapter.24.quest.53.description.1:
&9重現方塊&r就像是一個很酷酷的門。右鍵點擊時，將會短暫消失一小段時間。


&6消失方塊&r會在右鍵時消失，也在也不回來。
chapter.24.quest.54.description.1:
&9砷鉛鐵建造器&r，當使用紅石訊號給予訊號時，會在訊號來自的方向生成一個臨時方塊。


&6砷鉛鐵反應器&r會將附近的黑曜石與地獄石轉換成假的金與鑽石。一小段時間後，將會吸收附近的方塊並爆炸，並在周圍產生高塔迷你幽靈。
chapter.24.quest.55.description.1:
當解鎖暮光高原生態域後，你將前往尋找一些要殺死的巨魔。


它們會掉落一些&9魔豆&r。你也可以在儲物箱中找到培養土，這是種植豆子的必需品。
chapter.24.quest.55.title: 拜訪巨人
chapter.24.quest.56.description.1:
使用灰燼之燈，你現在將可以燒掉荊棘林地的荊棘。


收集一些荊棘玫瑰來繼續前往最終高地。
chapter.24.quest.56.title: 每個荊棘都有屬於他的玫瑰
chapter.24.quest.6.description.1:
在暮光森林中，戰利品箱會給你稀有的樹苗。


將它們全部收集吧！
chapter.24.quest.6.subtitle: 成長中的樹木
chapter.24.quest.6.title: 真正的最終魔王
chapter.24.quest.7.description.1:
你的暮光冒險章節將從庭院中開始，你可以在裡面找到納迦。


殺死納迦將可以讓你前往到下一個魔王，巫妖。
chapter.24.quest.7.title: 該來弄平那些鱗片了
chapter.24.quest.8.description.1:
在他的塔內，住著一位強大的巫妖。


這是一場三階段的戰鬥，但只有其中一個階段是獨特的。


階段一：巫妖會用護盾包住自己，並用像是地獄幽靈的火球射出終界珍珠來攻擊你。將這些反射回去給巫妖以打破他的盾牌！當他的盾牌破裂時，它將會生成複製品來分散你的注意力。


階段二：巫妖將切換他的權杖，招喚殭屍來幫助他的戰鬥。隨著他的防禦力下降，你將可以近戰攻擊他！


階段三：當他把所有權杖的能力使用完後，它將切換成一把金劍並開始狂暴化。趕緊殺了他！
chapter.24.quest.8.title: 帶出死亡
chapter.24.quest.9.description.1:
在牛頭人迷宮的最深處有一個巨大的哞菇牛頭人王。


當擊敗後，它會掉落牛頭人肉醬。要解鎖下一個區域，你必須吃掉它。
chapter.24.quest.9.title: 強大肉醬
chapter.24.title: 暮光森林
chapter.3.quest.1.title: 變成「創造」。
chapter.3.quest.10.title: 現實大師
chapter.3.quest.11.title: 巨龍大師
chapter.3.quest.12.title: 不死大師
chapter.3.quest.13.title: 無限魔力
chapter.3.quest.14.subtitle: 足夠合成這模組包裡的所有東西？
chapter.3.quest.14.title: 為一生做好準備
chapter.3.quest.15.title: 矮人大師
chapter.3.quest.16.title: 火焰大師
chapter.3.quest.17.subtitle: 那還真多錠。
chapter.3.quest.18.subtitle: 凋零不算是 Boss。
chapter.3.quest.2.title: 創造大師
chapter.3.quest.3.title: 天空大師
chapter.3.quest.4.title: 煉金術大師
chapter.3.quest.5.title: 時空大師
chapter.3.quest.6.title: 維度大師
chapter.3.quest.7.description.1:
ATM 之星


這是合成創造模式物品的必需品。
chapter.3.quest.7.subtitle: 主宰世界。
chapter.3.quest.7.title: &6ATM 之星
chapter.3.quest.8.title: 派大星…？大師…？
chapter.3.quest.9.title: 遺落大師
chapter.3.title: 創造
chapter.4.quest.1.description.1: 一個簡單自動化無限水的物品。需要更多水嗎？再做一個吧！
chapter.4.quest.1.subtitle: 可被用作反應爐冷卻劑。
chapter.4.quest.10.description.1: 在這頁，你會找到一些能在旅途中助你一臂之力的物品和資訊。
chapter.4.quest.10.subtitle: 還有更多有用的物品！
chapter.4.quest.10.task.1.title: 提示和訣竅！
chapter.4.quest.11.subtitle: 一個簡單的磁鐵！
chapter.4.quest.12.description.1:
如果你不熟悉疾風戒指：它是一種創造模式飛行的方法！它需要少量的 EMC 來運作。


至於在轉換臺之前的 EMC 來源，我們推薦螢光石及紅石；或是這個模組的電池，卡萊恩能量之星。你可以在反物質替換器中填充它們！
chapter.4.quest.2.description.1: 用這個物品來變小。對於在為自動化施工時很有幫助，也很好玩。
chapter.4.quest.2.subtitle: 寶貝，我把自己縮小了
chapter.4.quest.3.description.1: 這個藥水可以讓你穿過牆壁看到各自的礦物。
chapter.4.quest.3.subtitle: 它就像是透視一樣！
chapter.4.quest.3.task.1.title: 鐵透視
chapter.4.quest.3.title: 礦物視野藥水
chapter.4.quest.4.description.1:
整個房間在一格方塊裡面！


更高等級的有更大的內部空間。
chapter.4.quest.4.subtitle: 當一個無限大小的世界太小了
chapter.4.quest.5.description.1: 這個物品是壓縮空間的說明，也是你進入壓縮空間世界所需的的工具。
chapter.4.quest.5.title: 壓縮空間
chapter.4.quest.6.description.1:
一些方便建築的小幫手。


&c破壞小幫手會直接消除方塊！
chapter.4.quest.6.title: 建築小幫手
chapter.4.quest.7.description.1:
在建築時很有幫助。


建造法杖有能在合成時加入的核心。蹲下時對空氣左鍵來切換核心。
chapter.4.quest.7.title: 建築法杖
chapter.4.quest.8.subtitle: 完成這全部的提示！
chapter.4.quest.8.title: 見多「示」廣
chapter.4.quest.9.description.1:
礦物視野藥水可以被用來合成項鍊！


項鍊是一種飾品，它維持更久且可以開關。
chapter.4.quest.9.task.1.title: 鐵透視項鍊
chapter.4.quest.9.title: 透視項鍊

chapter.5.quest.13.description.1:
在這裡，你可以透過殺死敵人來獲得獎勵。


這個頁面仍在製作當中！
賢者之石透過發射你背包內的卡萊恩之星或一小點紅石來將怪物轉成其他種怪物。
但請小心，我在測試的時候被一隻喚魔者殺死，還有因為地獄幽靈而失去的小箱箱…
喔對，記得拿個免費的夜魅護符，你會感激我的
chapter.5.quest.13.subtitle: 殺死所有事物

chapter.5.title: 懸賞板
chapter.6.quest.1.description.1:
歡迎來到 All The Mods 7 - 翱翔天際！


如果你曾玩過原版（或任何空島生存），在進入到 ATM 金屬之前，你必須做大部份的事情，這應該無須解釋對吧？


但如果不是，別怕！這些任務將指導你的開始。


本章節內有包含一些遊戲內的啟發式動畫教學！它們將作為獎勵給予。點擊領取獎勵來觀看啟發式教學，它將會啟發你有關於該物品的知識！
chapter.6.quest.1.title: &9開始入門！
chapter.6.quest.10.description.1:
要獲得資源，我們需要將鵝卵石粉碎成可以篩分的情況。


這就是槌子派上用場的地方。放下你想要槌的方塊，然後… 嗯對… 槌它。


記住，你也可以槌壓縮的物品。
chapter.6.quest.10.reward.2.title: 點擊觀看教學！
chapter.6.quest.10.subtitle: 被過度使用的玩笑
chapter.6.quest.10.title: 錘子時間！
chapter.6.quest.11.description.1: 想知道如何獲得這個？收集上一個任務的獎勵！
chapter.6.quest.12.description.1:
Sieving is your most common method of gathering resources in this modpack, and most materials can be acquired this way! 


Different meshes yield different resources, same for sieving different materials! Meshes can also be enchanted with fortune for a higher yield.


You can also sieve blocks 25 at a time by making 25 Oak Sieves, and placing them in a 5x5. Right-clicking the middle Sieve with the item you want to sieve will use 25 instead of 1. Each of them do need meshes.
chapter.6.quest.12.reward.1.title: 點擊觀看教學！
chapter.6.quest.12.subtitle: 就像是烤蛋糕一樣簡單！
chapter.6.quest.13.description.1:
大部分的旅程開始都是透過篩礦來獲得材料。我們將在下一個任務中了解更多訊息。


別害怕製造大量的礫石。篩礫石才是你進展的方法！
chapter.6.quest.13.subtitle: 第一次的篩礦
chapter.6.quest.13.title: 礫石
chapter.6.quest.14.description.1:
使用礫石，你將會開始獲得一些實際資源。


如果你想知道每個篩網在篩東西時會掉什麼，你可以通過按「U」鍵在 JEI 中的篩網來查看列表。
chapter.6.quest.14.subtitle: 我們的第一次升級
chapter.6.quest.18.title: 最後的篩網
chapter.6.quest.19.subtitle: x2 槌子
chapter.6.quest.2.description.1:
砍倒一棵樹，就像是以前一樣。


嗯對，就跟其他空島模組包一樣，你可以靠狂按蹲下來讓你的樹長得更快。
chapter.6.quest.2.subtitle: 每個人旅程的開始
chapter.6.quest.2.task.1.title: 任何 #minecraft:logs（木頭）
chapter.6.quest.2.task.2.title: 任何 #minecraft:planks（木材）
chapter.6.quest.2.title: 我朝九晚五…
chapter.6.quest.20.subtitle: x3 槌子
chapter.6.quest.21.description.1:
為了加快獲取資源的速度，你也可以直接製作壓縮的鵝卵石、礫石等等，並用槌子敲壓縮的版本來節省時間！


鑑於我們的自動篩礦模組，我們認為最好別拿這些東西來篩，但手動敲仍是可以的！
chapter.6.quest.21.subtitle: 用槌子敲壓縮物品仍然是一件事！
chapter.6.quest.21.title: 搥壓縮物品
chapter.6.quest.22.description.1:
一旦你有礫石篩網時，你就可以開始從篩礦中獲得基本材料，像是鐵！


將你的礦物碎片組合起來，並開始製作原礦石，然後就像是往常一樣丟進熔爐！
chapter.6.quest.23.description.1:
對泥土使用從篩土取得的菌絲孢子可以將它轉換為菌絲土。


放在菌絲土上的桶子可以將水變成菌絲水。


對菌絲水使用沙子會轉換為靈魂沙。


還是不太懂？看看桶子任務的獎勵！
chapter.6.quest.23.title: 靈魂砂
chapter.6.quest.24.description.1:
桶子是此包獲取材料的重要途徑之一，僅次於篩礦。


這些可以用水製作黏土，用靈魂沙做菌絲水，甚至用樹苗製作出土。


備註：這在雨天時會被雨水灌滿。
chapter.6.quest.24.reward.1.title: 點擊觀看教學！
chapter.6.quest.25.description.1: 將桶裝滿水，並拿粉塵右鍵點它來獲得黏土。
chapter.6.quest.26.description.1:
我的意思是它只是個空島，無論我們在任務中嘗試向你展示多少種不同的發電方式，你最終還是會在你的基地中放置至少超過 20 個…


當在其下方放置熱源時，它將會開始生產熔岩。你可以在最初的時候使用火把來當熱源，即使它很慢。填入一些鵝卵石來開始生產。
chapter.6.quest.26.title: 火的起點
chapter.6.quest.27.description.1: 對於那些想要快速開始的人來說，這裡為你提供了一個「簡單模式」來開始。你也可以不需要完成這個任務，這是可選的。
chapter.6.quest.27.subtitle: 給那些想要跳過的
chapter.6.quest.27.title: 從「頭」開始
chapter.6.quest.28.description.1:
如果你不想在餘生下對地板點右鍵，請製作這其中一個。


你需要在坩堝中製作熔岩，並且有足夠的鐵製作兩個鐵桶。


相信我，這很值得的。它會自動生產鵝卵石，並導出到貼上的儲物空間，例如來自功能性儲存模組（Functional Storage）的橡木抽屜。
chapter.6.quest.28.title: 鵝卵石製造機 第一代
chapter.6.quest.3.description.1:
如果你在工作台上用鐵包圍了一圈熔爐，那麼你將可以把你的熔爐升級成鐵熔爐。


這可以燒的更快，也可以通過 GUI 內的右上角的齒輪設定自動化。
chapter.6.quest.3.subtitle: 這包內的所有東西都包含了升級？
chapter.6.quest.3.title: 熔爐升級？
chapter.6.quest.33.description.1:
熱源是影響坩堝岩漿生產速度的重要因素！這模組包改了一些東西，所以這邊給一個清單讓你選擇：


植物魔法的烈焰網：x8
鈾塊：x20
通用機械的發熱元件：x60
暗物質方塊：x100
chapter.6.quest.33.task.1.title: 坩堝的熱源！
chapter.6.quest.34.description.1: 用光樹苗了？你可以在任務選單的右上角花一點時間獲得緊急樹苗應急！
chapter.6.quest.34.task.1.title: 緊急樹苗
chapter.6.quest.35.description.1:
對菌絲水使用菌絲孢子會將它變成棕色蘑菇方塊。


放下蘑菇方塊並破壞它，它有機會掉落棕色蘑菇。


對菌絲水使用棕色方塊，它會變成可被分解成 9 個史萊姆球的史萊姆磚。
chapter.6.quest.35.title: 史萊姆球
chapter.6.quest.4.description.1: 蘋果並不能永遠餵飽你！你也需要一點不同種類的食物對吧？那麼，開始建造新的小型農場來製作更多樣的食物吧！
chapter.6.quest.4.subtitle: 基礎食物
chapter.6.quest.4.task.2.title: 任何鋤頭
chapter.6.quest.4.title: 開始的農場生活
chapter.6.quest.5.description.1: 查看&a農作與食品&r章節，來瞭解更多有關於好吃的食物知識。
chapter.6.quest.5.subtitle: 食物入門
chapter.6.quest.5.task.1.title: 農作與食品
chapter.6.quest.5.title: 農作與食品章節
chapter.6.quest.6.description.1:
有超級多種方式可以讓你發出你第一桶電。


RFTools 的煤炭發電機就可以幫你，這也是最簡單製作的發電機之一。
chapter.6.quest.6.subtitle: 你的第一個發電機
chapter.6.quest.6.title: 初始發電機
chapter.6.quest.7.description.1:
如果我們想要開始在 ATM7 翱翔天際 中自動化生產，那麼我們就需要探索我們未來的能源。


要繼續我們的進展，請查看&a開始入門：第二部分&r來讓我們可以朝向更多能源發展前進！
chapter.6.quest.7.subtitle: 開始超越能源
chapter.6.quest.7.task.1.title: 發電時間！
chapter.6.quest.7.title: 開始入門：第二部分
chapter.6.quest.8.description.1:
就像是其他空島一樣，你可以在草地中翻找小石頭（對草地右鍵），但在這裡的運作方式略有不同。


你有 50% 的機率獲得小鵝卵石，並且也有 50% 機率獲得其他種類的小石頭。
chapter.6.quest.8.title: 踢石頭
chapter.6.quest.9.description.1:
鉤子可以給你更多的機率從樹葉中獲得樹苗與蘋果，同時也會給你蠶寶寶，你需要蠶寶寶才能進一步獲得線。


源自虛無的模組絕大部份（不是全部）都有啟發式動畫教學！領取本章獎勵即可觀看教學！
chapter.6.quest.9.reward.1.title: 點擊觀看教學！
chapter.6.quest.9.title: 那是彎的，還是我的眼睛好笑？
chapter.6.title: 開始入門
chapter.7.quest.1.description.1: 你應該要準備好一台煤炭發電機！
chapter.7.quest.1.subtitle: 基本
chapter.7.quest.1.task.1.title: 開始入門：第二部分｜基本能源
chapter.7.quest.10.subtitle: 煙燻食物
chapter.7.quest.11.subtitle: 要更快！
chapter.7.quest.12.subtitle: 更好的燃料效率
chapter.7.quest.13.description.1:
把無線熱能發射器連接到你的能源系統。將接收器放進發射器中來將它們相連，再把接收器放進熔爐中作為燃料。


這將會賦予你的熔爐無線能源！
chapter.7.quest.13.subtitle: 無線熱能？
chapter.7.quest.13.title: 給熔爐的無線能源！
chapter.7.quest.14.description.1:
所有 PipeZ 的管道都能用「管道升級」來升級。


按下 Shift 並右鍵設為「輸出」的管道來添加管道升級。
chapter.7.quest.14.subtitle: 提升管道輸出
chapter.7.quest.14.title: 管道升級
chapter.7.quest.15.description.1:
是時候拿些黑曜石去地獄了！
顯然，它也是個虛空世界，但地獄要塞仍然可以正常生成。
chapter.7.quest.15.subtitle: 速通玩家已經在那裡了。
chapter.7.quest.15.title: 前往地獄！
chapter.7.quest.16.description.1:
用水填滿一個 2x2 的洞，再用植物和花朵將它圍起來，然後丟一顆鑽石進去。


有些和閃電有關的事，但&o我不會在乎。
chapter.7.quest.16.subtitle: 牛頭人在等候
chapter.7.quest.16.task.2.title: 任何花朵
chapter.7.quest.16.title: 前往暮光森林！
chapter.7.quest.17.description.1:
烈焰桿對於推進進度至關重要，取得它們最簡單的方法是去地獄（儘管你能篩到烈焰粉，或是把烈焰娃娃放進桶子中來召喚烈焰神）。


如果你找到了生怪磚，你可以做個通用機械的紙箱來把生怪磚帶回家。
chapter.7.quest.17.title: 什麼藏在烈焰之中
chapter.7.quest.18.description.1:
在這個模組包，這種稀有的材料可以在暮光森林的礦山中找到（數量取決於礦山的大小）。
注意：你需要一把獄髓鎬來挖它，獄髓可以篩到。
chapter.7.quest.18.subtitle: 眾多中的第一個
chapter.7.quest.18.title: 是時候弄些「真正」的錠了
chapter.7.quest.19.description.1:
傳送台是你到異獄的途徑。




將傳送台放在地獄，按下 Shift 並空手右鍵它以前往異獄。
chapter.7.quest.19.subtitle: 跨維度旅行
chapter.7.quest.2.description.1:
讓我們做個冶金灌注機吧。


這個機器讓你能做一些可以被作為能源及被其他機器利用的材料。


將灌注機放在煤炭發電機旁邊來給它電力。
chapter.7.quest.2.subtitle: 創造更多電力
chapter.7.quest.2.title: 利用我們的電力
chapter.7.quest.20.description.1:
異獄是個危險的地方。請確定你已萬事俱備！


你會在那裡找到豬布林巫妖。你會需要他們的心臟！！！
chapter.7.quest.20.title: 前往異獄！
chapter.7.quest.21.description.1:
你需要一些烈焰桿和烈焰粉來製作藥水。


如果你想要為自己做些礦物視野藥水，你會需要這個！
chapter.7.quest.21.subtitle: 釀造一些麻煩
chapter.7.quest.21.task.2.title: 3x 平凡藥水
chapter.7.quest.21.title: 藥水大師
chapter.7.quest.22.description.1:
有了這些物品，現在你可以為自己做些鑽石視野藥水！


當喝下之後，你可以穿過方塊看見鑽石礦。
chapter.7.quest.22.subtitle: 與光影不相容
chapter.7.quest.22.task.1.title: 3x 鑽石透視
chapter.7.quest.22.title: 透視藥水
chapter.7.quest.23.description.1:
要製作礦物視野藥水的話，你需要先做出研缽和杵。用它們來做終界粉，它能用來做藥水所需的礦物粉。


在工作台中，用以上三個物品並配上一顆鑽石來取得鑽石粉。將它放進熔爐，就能得到煅燒過的粉了。
chapter.7.quest.23.subtitle: 礦物… 粉？
chapter.7.quest.23.title: 透視藥水的配方
chapter.7.quest.24.description.1:
用你剛剛做的礦物透視藥水，為自己做個項鍊吧！


他們比藥水更持久且可以開關。
chapter.7.quest.24.subtitle: 它同時也是個飾品！
chapter.7.quest.24.task.1.title: 鑽石透視項鍊
chapter.7.quest.24.title: 透視項鍊？
chapter.7.quest.26.description.1:
你需要汎金屬來晉升到下一個挖掘階級。


汎金屬可以在異獄的 Y0 至 Y20 找到。
chapter.7.quest.26.title: 尋找汎金屬
chapter.7.quest.27.subtitle: 在一片虛無當中，你不需要尋找終界傳送門。你只要品嘗一口（有點酸的）終界蛋糕就踏上你的康莊大道了！
chapter.7.quest.27.title: 前往終界！
chapter.7.quest.28.subtitle: 第一次…
chapter.7.quest.28.task.1.title: 殺死終界龍！
chapter.7.quest.28.title: &5殺死終界龍！
chapter.7.quest.29.description.1:
如果你在伺服器上且終界龍已經被殺了，你會需要重新召喚它。


帶四個終界水晶，並在終界的返回傳送門的四個邊上各放一個。
chapter.7.quest.29.subtitle: 以防有人已經殺了它…
chapter.7.quest.29.title: 如何重新召喚龍
chapter.7.quest.3.description.1:
讓我們取得風力發電機的材料吧。


先把紅石放在最左邊的格子，再把鐵放在中間偏左的格子。這會做出灌注合金。


要製作控制電路，你需要兩個紅石和一個鋨錠。


用這些東西來做兩個能量板。
chapter.7.quest.3.subtitle: 取得零件
chapter.7.quest.3.title: 風力發電機：第一部分
chapter.7.quest.30.description.1:
如果你不知道，終界還有屠龍以外的東西。


在龍被殺死之後，你會發現一個奇怪的「結構」，帶有一個夾在方塊之間的傳送門。拿個終界珍珠並丟進傳送門。
chapter.7.quest.30.subtitle: 它其實真的很漂亮。
chapter.7.quest.30.task.1.title: 到「真正」的終界
chapter.7.quest.31.description.1:
在終界的某些地方，你會找到一艘飄浮的船。


擊敗那邊的敵人並到寶藏室去，你將找到你的第一個鞘翅。
chapter.7.quest.31.subtitle: 但我們有噴射背包？
chapter.7.quest.31.title: 原版「飛行」
chapter.7.quest.32.description.1:
難得素只能在終界高地生態域找到。


注意：生態域羅盤可以幫你找到該生態域！
chapter.7.quest.32.subtitle: 更像是「不」難得素？
chapter.7.quest.32.title: &5難得素
chapter.7.quest.34.description.1:
富集倉能把三個原礦變成三個粉末。這能給你多帶來 25% 的錠。


通用機械有個處理系統能幫你建造一個工廠，讓你從原礦中取得更多產物。
chapter.7.quest.34.subtitle: 發展成一座礦物工廠。
chapter.7.quest.34.title: 繼續弄通用機械
chapter.7.quest.35.description.1:
將你的磨粉機直接放在鐵熔爐的左側來自動化礦物熔煉。

在它們兩個的上方放上箱子，然後用磨粉機裡面的齒輪設定輸出和輸入。將上面設為藍色（輸入）並將右側設為紅色（輸出）。別忘了按下「自動輸入」和「自動輸出」按鈕。


在鐵熔爐中，你需要做一樣的事，不過是從左側輸入並從上面輸出。
chapter.7.quest.35.subtitle: 繼續弄熱力膨脹
chapter.7.quest.35.task.1.title: 用磨粉機自動化礦物熔煉
chapter.7.quest.35.title: 用熱力膨脹自動化礦物熔煉
chapter.7.quest.36.description.1:
要用通用機械來自動化礦物熔煉的話，將你的富集倉直接放在鐵熔爐的左側，然後在它們兩個的上方放上箱子。


在富集倉中的「各面配置」設定右側為輸出。別忘了按下「自動彈出」按鈕。


你會需要用管道連接富集倉及上方的箱子來輸入物品。這可以透過 &aPipeZ&r 的物品管道或 &9通用機械&r的基礎物流管道來達成。


在鐵熔爐中，你需要將左側設為輸入和將上方設為輸出。別忘了按下自動輸入和輸出按鈕。
chapter.7.quest.36.subtitle: 工廠來臨。
chapter.7.quest.36.task.1.title: 用通用機械自動化礦物熔煉
chapter.7.quest.36.title: 用通用機械自動化礦物熔煉
chapter.7.quest.37.description.1: 要開始入門通用機械，請查看在&6科技&r群組中的&a通用機械&r章節。
chapter.7.quest.37.task.1.title: 通用機械入門
chapter.7.quest.38.description.1: 熱力膨脹是一個簡單的電力模組！查看&6熱力系列&r章節以開始入門！
chapter.7.quest.38.subtitle: 合金在你的未來中。
chapter.7.quest.38.task.1.title: 開始入門熱力膨脹
chapter.7.quest.39.description.1:
基礎能量立方體是個電池。


你可以把需要充電的物品放進它右邊的格子來充電！


這表示是時候飛行了！
chapter.7.quest.39.subtitle: 通用機械可以做到這一切！
chapter.7.quest.39.title: 儲存電力
chapter.7.quest.4.description.1:
我們需要一些方法來從風力發電機中轉移電力。


去給自己做一些能量管道和管道扳手。你會需要管道扳手來讓管道抽取電力。


注意：按下 Shift 並右鍵點擊和風力發電機相連的管道來讓管道「抽取」電力。
chapter.7.quest.4.subtitle: 便宜的 Pipez
chapter.7.quest.4.title: 連接電力
chapter.7.quest.40.description.1: 讓一些地獄幽靈飛起來，收集他們的眼淚。
chapter.7.quest.40.subtitle: 到底有多少隱藏任務？
chapter.7.quest.40.title: 隱藏任務：地獄
chapter.7.quest.41.description.1:
作為一個空島，所有人都認識岩漿的力量，它終究會發生，有些人甚至到了後期還在用。
提示：你可以用 ATM 礦石的礦鎚來把錠變成粉以取得殷鋼混合粉，直到你有能做這件事的機器。
chapter.7.quest.41.subtitle: 空島方式
chapter.7.quest.41.title: 更多電力
chapter.7.quest.42.description.1:
歡迎來到特地為這模組包製作自動篩網模組！


這些機器沒有內建輸出空間，篩網從底下輸出、鎚子從前面輸出，兩者都有自動輸出，所以你可以不用任何管線就建立一套系統。


注意：這些機器在輸出空間沒有剩餘空間的情況下不會運作。
chapter.7.quest.43.description.1: 就像篩網一樣，這機器自動輸出到底部！
chapter.7.quest.44.description.1: 黃金和鑽石升級堆疊至三個，將游標移至升級上方以查看各自的數量！
chapter.7.quest.5.description.1:
磨粉機是一個熱力膨脹的一個基礎機器，它能將一個原礦變成一個粉末，同時有 25% 的機率額外產生一個粉末。這通常代表能多 25% 的錠。


請記得將它接上電力！


注意：這些也可以被升級。
chapter.7.quest.5.subtitle: 回想起 IC2 的磨粉機
chapter.7.quest.5.title: 交給機會！
chapter.7.quest.6.description.1:
這是我們會做的第一個噴射背包。不過它的續航力不會太好。


請務必儘快升級它！
chapter.7.quest.6.subtitle: 媽！我在飛！
chapter.7.quest.6.title: 我們的首次翱翔
chapter.7.quest.7.description.1:
這個可充電的物品可以幫你放置方塊。


若要使用，請找到在建築小幫手欄目之下的「設定」所綁定的按鍵
chapter.7.quest.7.subtitle: 抱歉了建築法杖，但我真的需要那個酷東西。
chapter.7.quest.7.title: 最棒的建築工具
chapter.7.quest.8.description.1:
鐵熔爐可以一直升級到難得素。


是時候升級了！
chapter.7.quest.8.title: 升級我們的熔鍊機
chapter.7.quest.9.subtitle: 轉變成高爐
chapter.7.title: 開始入門：第二部分
chapter.8.quest.1.description.1:
Welcome to &9Tinkers' Construct!&r


TC is all about creating custom tools and armor by creating individual parts that combine to make bigger and better tools!


It also adds new ways to smelt ores with custom multiblock Smelteries for all of your smelting needs.
chapter.8.quest.1.subtitle: Custom Tools and Armor!
chapter.8.quest.1.task.1.title: Welcome to Tinkers' Construct!
chapter.8.quest.10.description.1:
The pants have low armor and durability, but comes with:


3 Upgrade Slots
2 Defense Slots
1 Ability Slot
chapter.8.quest.11.description.1:
As the rest of the gear, the boots come with low durability and armor, but comes with:


3 Upgrade Slots
2 Defense Slots
1 Ability Slot
chapter.8.quest.12.description.1:
Using the Tinker Station, you can modify your tools.


Modifiers add special stats and abilities to your tools based on the modifier type.


This section explains the types of modifiers!
chapter.8.quest.12.task.1.title: Modifiers
chapter.8.quest.13.description.1:
Traits are abilities or extra stats that are attached to either the type of tool, or the materials the tool was built out of.


To see all of the different kinds of traits, make sure to check out the books &eMaterials and You&r, &eMighty Smelting&r, and &eFantastic Foundry&r.
chapter.8.quest.13.task.1.title: Traits
chapter.8.quest.14.description.1:
Each tool starts with 3 to 4 upgrade slots. These slots can be used to enhance the tool, like adding redstone to increase the speed.


Make sure to check out the book &9Puny Smelting&r to see all of the available upgrades!
chapter.8.quest.14.task.1.title: Tool Upgrade Slots
chapter.8.quest.15.description.1:
Slotless Modifiers do not require a slot to add. You can add as many as you'd like.


These are usually cosmetic.


To see a list of available Slotless Modifiers, check out the book &ePuny Smelting&r.
chapter.8.quest.15.task.1.title: Slotless Modifiers
chapter.8.quest.15.title: Slotless Mods
chapter.8.quest.16.description.1:
Abilities are powerful modifiers, like Silk Touch or Autosmelt.


Abilities require ability slots on the tool, which most tools start with at least one slot. You can only add 1 more ability slot per tool, so choose wisely!


The book &eMighty Smelting&r lists all available abilities that can be placed on tools.
chapter.8.quest.16.task.1.title: Tool Abilities
chapter.8.quest.17.description.1:
These mods are applied to Armor, which gives certain defense abilities like Fire Resistance.


If you're looking to check out all of the available Defense Modifiers, check out the book &eMighty Smelting&r.
chapter.8.quest.17.task.1.title: Defense Mods
chapter.8.quest.18.description.1:
To be able to use metals to create tools, we'll need a smeltery, which is created from &eGrout&r.


To create Grout, you'll need Sand, Gravel, and Clay. Get as much as you can!
chapter.8.quest.18.subtitle: I am Grout.
chapter.8.quest.18.title: Gathering Grout
chapter.8.quest.19.description.1:
&eMaterials and You&r is the starter guide for Tinkers' Construct.


You can also just use the Eccentric Tome that you started with, as it should have this book inside of it.


You might be wondering why you're getting one in return. You'll need it to upgrade the book to the next tier!
chapter.8.quest.19.subtitle: The Starter Guide
chapter.8.quest.2.description.1:
To get started in TC, you'll need to create &ePatterns&r.


These are made out of planks and sticks, so make sure to make plenty of them!


These are used to create the basic tables we'll need to create parts, as well as making tool patterns to create new tools!
chapter.8.quest.2.subtitle: The Basic Pattern
chapter.8.quest.2.title: 樣板
chapter.8.quest.20.description.1: This book will teach you how to make your first setup, the Melter.
chapter.8.quest.21.description.1:
Smelting &eGrout&r will give you &9Seared Bricks&r. Don't confuse these with the block Brick, as those are different.


&9Seared Brick&r is the basic crafting material used to make a smeltery. It never hurts to get as many as you can.
chapter.8.quest.21.title: Throw it in the Furnace
chapter.8.quest.22.description.1:
To create metal tools, we'll need to make a Smeltery to make molten metal.


We're going to make a Melter, which is the first simple smeltery we'll need before we can make our big custom smelteries.


This is how the Melter is setup:
chapter.8.quest.22.title: Your First Smeltery
chapter.8.quest.23.description.1: At the start, you can make Sand Casts to create the tool casts for your first metal parts.
chapter.8.quest.23.title: Single-Use Metal Casts
chapter.8.quest.24.description.1:
If you have the gold, you can make reusable casts by pouring the molten gold over the item you are looking to make a cast out of.


Let's make an Ingot Gold Cast. Place some gold in the Melter to smelt it into Molten Gold, then place an ingot on the Casting Table. Right click on the faucet to pour out the Molten Gold over the ingot, creating us an Ingot Cast.
chapter.8.quest.24.title: Reusable Metal Casts
chapter.8.quest.25.description.1:
Using our Melter, let's smelt down some Copper.


Start by smelting 4 ingots of Copper in the Melter. Then, place a Seared Brick in our Casting Basin.


With the Copper selected in the Melter (left click if you have other molten metals inside), right-click on the faucet to pour out the Molten Copper in the Casting Basin.


This will create our Smeltery Controller.
chapter.8.quest.25.title: Making the Smeltery Controller
chapter.8.quest.26.description.1:
It's time to build the Smeltery.


This can be any size, up to 16x16x64, but it must be rectangular.


The basic standard Smeltery starts with a 3x3 base, usually in the ground. Then on the next layer, add Seared Bricks around the edges. At the front of the Smeltery, you'll place your Smeltery Controller and Seared Tank.


To pump molten ingots out, we'll need a Seared Drain to pour the molten metal into our Casting Table and Basin. Don't forget the Faucets!
chapter.8.quest.26.title: The Mighty Smeltery
chapter.8.quest.27.description.1: To learn more about creating a Smeltery, let's make the next book: Mighty Smelting
chapter.8.quest.27.subtitle: Taking the Training Wheels Off
chapter.8.quest.28.description.1: These blocks can be used as a replacement for Seared Bricks, while still making the Smeltery functional!
chapter.8.quest.28.title: Customizing your Smeltery
chapter.8.quest.29.description.1:
Aside from the Seared Drain, there are more ways to pump fluids and items into or out of your Smeltery.


The &9Seared Duct&r allows you to pump specific fluids out of your Smeltery. To do this, fill a Copper Can or Bucket filled with the fluid you wish to filter out, then put it inside of the Duct to act as a filter. This will then be shown in the middle of the Duct.


The &6Seared Chute&r allows you to pump items into the Smeltery.
chapter.8.quest.29.title: Input/Output
chapter.8.quest.3.description.1:
To start crafting custom tools, we'll need 2 things:


The &9Tinker Station&r, which is what we'll use to combine parts into tools. This is also where you'll repair, upgrade, and enchance your tools.


The &9Part Builder&r, which is what we'll use to create parts using &ePatterns&r and materials.


Note: If you place these beside each other, you can access them all from one block! This also works for other TC workbenches or anvils.
chapter.8.quest.30.description.1:
The Smeltery will combine molten ingots together to create &9Alloys&r. You'll figure this out really fast if you just pump random ores into it.


We will need alloys to create better tools and armor, so let's get ourselves some Bronze.


To get Bronze, smelt Copper and Tin together. The alloy is 3 parts Copper, 1 part Tin.


Tip: Pouring the molten Bronze into a Casting Basin creates a Bronze block, instead of making the individual ingots with the Casting Table.
chapter.8.quest.30.title: Making Alloys
chapter.8.quest.31.description.1:
The &6Tinker's Anvil&r is the upgrade to the Tinker Station.


It allows you to create &9Broad Tools&r like the Hammer, Excavator, and more.


Note: The anvil top can be made out of any alloy, not just Bronze.
chapter.8.quest.31.subtitle: The Ultimate Creation Table
chapter.8.quest.32.description.1:
If you want to increase the amount of storage and input slots the Smeltery has, build the Smeltery upwards!


Every layer on top of the Smeltery increases the amount of items it can smelt at the same time, and how much molten Ingots it can store.


The max height is 64.
chapter.8.quest.32.subtitle: Size Does Matter
chapter.8.quest.32.title: Increasing the Size
chapter.8.quest.33.description.1:
If you're new to TC, it's helpful to know each part of the Smeltery and how it functions.


The main controller, whether it is a &9Melter&r or &9Smeltery Controller&r will have a GUI when you right click. If it doesn't, the structure isn't complete!


This is how you manually insert ores and items into the Smeltery.
chapter.8.quest.33.task.1.title: Understanding Smeltery Parts
chapter.8.quest.34.description.1:
&9Casting Basins&r are used to create blocks out of molten metal. This is the easiest way to get metal out of the Smeltery, as it extracts 9 ingots to create a block. These can also be used to create specific items by pouring molten metals onto blocks placed in the Basin.


&9Casting Tables&r are used for more precise pours, like creating casts or tool parts.
chapter.8.quest.34.task.1.title: Casting Basin and Table
chapter.8.quest.35.description.1:
When right-clicked, &9Faucets&r function as a way to extract molten ingots from the Smeltery. This will only work if there is something to pour out onto, like a Casting Table.


&9Channels&r are used to extend the reach of a faucet, and create a pipe-like network for molten liquids.
chapter.8.quest.35.task.1.title: Faucets and Channels
chapter.8.quest.36.description.1:
&9Seared Fuel Tanks&r store liquids that are used to heat up the Smeltery to smelt items down. These can stack on top of each other within the Smeltery multi-block, and can hold 4 buckets of fuel.


Certain &eFuels&r are required to smelt certain ingots, depending on the heat required. Lava works for most ores, but you'll need &6Blazing Blood&r to smelt higher tier materials, like Allthemodium.
chapter.8.quest.36.task.1.title: Fuel Tanks and Fuels
chapter.8.quest.37.description.1:
The Smeltery can be used to smelt entities to create items.


&lNotable Entities:&r


Players - Blood (Slimeball substitute)
Silverfish - Seared Stone
Villagers and Illagers - Emeralds
Skeletons - Milk
Ender Dragon - What?
chapter.8.quest.37.subtitle: Don't Stand in the Smeltery
chapter.8.quest.37.title: Smelting Entities
chapter.8.quest.38.description.1:
Looking for a complete list of Materials, Upgrades, and more?


Make you one of these. It's better than having to flip through 4 different TC books.
chapter.8.quest.38.subtitle: The "All in One" Book
chapter.8.quest.39.description.1:
If we want to make a TC Foundry, we'll need something stronger than Seared Bricks.


Head to the Nether for Magma Cream and Soul Sand. You'll need these to craft you some &9Nether Grout&r.
chapter.8.quest.39.subtitle: I am Nether Grout.
chapter.8.quest.39.title: Nether Grout
chapter.8.quest.4.description.1: The Part Chest is used to store extra parts that you might need in the future.
chapter.8.quest.4.subtitle: Storing Parts
chapter.8.quest.40.description.1: This book contains all of the information needed to create and use a Foundry, as well as a list of Tier 4 Materials and how to create Plate Armor.
chapter.8.quest.40.subtitle: How-To Foundry
chapter.8.quest.41.description.1:
To create the Foundry, we'll need the &6Foundry Controller&r.


To get this, place a Scorched Brick in a Casting Basin, then pour at least 1 block's worth of Obsidian over it.
chapter.8.quest.41.title: Creating a Foundry Controller
chapter.8.quest.42.description.1: Smelting Nether Grout will give us &6Scorched Bricks&r, which is what we'll use to create our Foundry.
chapter.8.quest.42.title: Nether Smelting
chapter.8.quest.43.description.1:
The &6Foundry&r is just like the Smeltery, but doesn't create alloys. No more worrying about mixing materials!


The Foundry also creates &9Byproducts&r from items smelted. For example, Copper can give Gold as a byproduct.


To create the Foundry, you'll need to build it like the Smeltery using Scorched items instead of Seared. The Foundry also needs corners to function.


Here is an example of a complete Foundry:
chapter.8.quest.43.title: Creating the Foundry
chapter.8.quest.44.description.1: Just like the Smeltery, there are many blocks you can use that function as Foundry blocks when creating your Foundry.
chapter.8.quest.44.title: Customizing the Foundry
chapter.8.quest.45.description.1:
For those that want to create alloys, this block will do exactly that.


It will need either a heater or fuel tank beneath it, and will need Ingot tanks adjacent to the Alloyer to create the alloys.


Insert the molten ingots into each of the Ingot Tanks, and the Alloyer will create the alloy.
chapter.8.quest.45.subtitle: For Those That Need Alloys
chapter.8.quest.46.description.1:
Lava will not cut it for smelting down ores like &6Allthemodium&r. For this you'll need something hotter.


Stacy's Mo- I mean &6Blazing Blood&r.


There are several ways to get this. You can smelt Blaze Heads in the Foundry, OR... smelt the Blazes directly.


Tip: Use &9Mekanism's &eCardboard Box&r to pick up a Blaze Spawner in the Nether. Bring the Blazes to your Foundry!!!!
chapter.8.quest.46.subtitle: 什麼藏在烈焰之中
chapter.8.quest.46.title: &6Blazing Blood&r
chapter.8.quest.47.description.1:
Want to melt entities by hand?


Adding the &6Melter&r ability to your tool allows you to melt the enemies directly into your tool.


Note: The Tool will require a &9Tank Upgrade&r to store liquids.
chapter.8.quest.47.title: Melting Tool Ability
chapter.8.quest.5.description.1: The Tinker's Chest allows you to store even more parts!
chapter.8.quest.5.subtitle: 更多存儲空間
chapter.8.quest.52.description.1: High Damage weapon that also decapitates.
chapter.8.quest.52.subtitle: Heavy Hitter
chapter.8.quest.52.title: Cleaver
chapter.8.quest.53.subtitle: 3x3 Digging
chapter.8.quest.53.title: Excavator
chapter.8.quest.54.subtitle: Kinda useless with Ultimine
chapter.8.quest.54.title: Vein Hammer
chapter.8.quest.55.subtitle: 3x3 Mining
chapter.8.quest.55.title: Sledge Hammer
chapter.8.quest.56.subtitle: Cuts down entire trees - Also useless with Ultimine
chapter.8.quest.57.subtitle: Reaping Tool for Farming
chapter.8.quest.58.description.1:
Tools can be repaired by placing them in a Tinker Station with the material they are made out of.


You can also make repair kits (from Tinkers' Construct, not Silent Gear) to repair them on the go.


Tools can also be upgraded by combining the new tool part with the tool in the Tinker Station.
chapter.8.quest.58.task.1.title: Repairing and Upgrading Tools
chapter.8.quest.59.description.1:
Deep in The Other, you will find a Volcano filled with the hottest liquid in all of Minecraft.


&6Soul Lava&r is used to make the Allthemodium alloys. You'll need this to make the ATM Star!
chapter.8.quest.59.subtitle: So hot it can melt anything, except an Iron Bucket.
chapter.8.quest.59.title: &6Soul Lava
chapter.8.quest.6.description.1:
Take some blank patterns and place them inside of your Part Builder.


you'll place materials beside the pattern to create certain parts. Start by placing some cobble in to create yourself a &9Stone Pickaxe Head&r, &9Stone Tool Rod&r, and &9Stone Binding&r.


Note: Metals like Ingots will not work in this table. This is only for basic materials like wood, stone, etc.
chapter.8.quest.6.title: Creating Parts
chapter.8.quest.60.description.1:
With Soul Lava, you'll be able to create the Allthemodium alloys.


Note: You will need to use either an Alloyer or the Smeltery to combine the ingots, as the Foundry does not make alloys.
chapter.8.quest.60.title: The ATM Alloys
chapter.8.quest.61.description.1:
If you're just starting out, you can make yourself some &9Traveler's Gear&r.


These gear pieces all boast several upgrade slots, defense slots, and an ability slot.


While it isn't the greatest for protection, it allows you to customize your armor.
chapter.8.quest.61.task.1.title: Traveler's Gear
chapter.8.quest.62.description.1:
Using Cobalt from the Nether, you can create yourself a customizable set of &9Plate Armor&r.


This is basically an upgrade from the Traveler's Gear.


Each piece of Plate Armor has high durability and armor, and they all come with:


1 Upgrade Slot
4 Defense Slots
1 Ability Slot
chapter.8.quest.62.task.1.title: Plate Armor
chapter.8.quest.7.description.1:
With our parts in hand, let's jump over to the Tinker Station.


The Tinker Station is how we combine parts to make tools, as well as upgrading and repairing them.


Select the Pickaxe left side, and you'll see the 3 items needed to craft a pickaxe. Place in your parts, and you'll have created your first tool!
chapter.8.quest.7.title: Your First Tool
chapter.8.quest.8.description.1:
The Traveler's Goggles has low armor and durability, but it also comes with:


3 Upgrade Slots
2 Defense Slots
1 Ability Slot
chapter.8.quest.9.description.1:
The Traveler's Vest has low armor and durability, but has:


3 Upgrade Slots
2 Defense Slots
1 Ability Slot

功能性儲存是一個用於存儲相同物品的模組。


這對於鵝卵石和泥土等物品很有用。

這物品能講放進它的物品轉為粒或方塊型態。


例如：放進一個鐵錠將會讓你能取出九個鐵粒。或是一個鐵磚，如果你放進更多鐵的話。

chapter.9.quest.4.description.1:
當放下並且透過&a連結工具&r與其他抽屜相連，這個方塊充當「樞紐」。


如果你對這個按雙擊右鍵，將會從你的背包匯入背包與抽屜「網路」中的相同物品。

chapter.9.quest.5.description.1:
能跨維度運作的箱子。


可以被上色來確保安全！（用你想要的染料對方塊右鍵）


注意：如果有人用了和你一樣的顏色組合，他們可以拿走其中的內容！
chapter.9.quest.5.title: 終界儲存
chapter.9.quest.51.description.1:
用於將抽屜連結到控制器和連結終界抽屜。


若要將抽屜連結至控制器，對控制器方塊右鍵以開始設定。右鍵抽屜會將他們加入到網路。


拿著該工具會顯示哪些抽屜連結到了控制器。

chapter.9.quest.9.description.1:
使用&a連結工具&r，你可以同步兩個終界抽屜的內容物。


就像終界箱一樣，不過是抽屜。


若要連結，使用&a連結工具&r右鍵第一個終界抽屜，然後再左鍵第二個抽屜以同步。
